column4: My Firefox occasionally opens 80+ tabs due too something beyond me. Does anyone know what causes this and how I can fix it? my etc/apt/sources.list : http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/49644/
Wols: Why is Automatix so bad?
Wols: I can remove the Repos it added from inside itself. Should I?
Wols: Done. Anything else I can do? Would "sudo apt-get remove automatix" remove it?
that may remove the program. but wont undo the damage its done.
Okay. Is there ANY way I can restore it?
no idea. I know better then to use AUtomatix. :)
there is/was an #automatix channel and thei web site/forums
Thanks :) I now understand that it's bad. But why is it bad? What bad stuff does it perform?
installs all kinds of things in bad ways  with littl eerror checking, and with the release of gutsy.. lets just say that automatix really is not needed these days
Wols: damn :/ So the easiest really would be to reinstall?
